CWEs: CWE-116: Improper Encoding or Escaping of Output
description: The function does not validate or sanitize the input 'str' and 'options' which can lead to Injection attacks. Also, the function does not properly escape or encode the output which can lead to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks. Furthermore, the function uses 'eval' which can execute arbitrary code if not properly handled.
